quoteText:
Further, deleted Content may persist in archival copies on Myspace servers for a reasonable period of time.
You understand and agree that once Content is distributed to a Linked Service, or incorporated into other aspects of the Myspace Services (e.g., as part of a derivative work), Myspace is under no obligation to delete or ask other Users or a Linked Service to delete that Content.
therefore, it may continue to appear and be used indefinitely.
title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
